content.rendered: All counseling services are provided by therapists who are advanced graduate students in the Marriage and Family Therapy or Clinical Psy.D. programs. Each therapist is under the supervision of the director, assistant director, and/or adjunct supervisors, all of whom are licensed, professional psychotherapists.
